```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(survminer)
library(bayesSurv)
devtools::install_github('jburos/biostan', build_vignettes = TRUE, dependencies = TRUE)
library(biostan)
library(rstan)
library(bayesplot)
library(tidybayes)
```
